creator: hugh.kennedy@divine.com
text:
i have a resource factory for resource objects that reference 'public static
final' constants in classes that i would like to contribute to the
org.apache.naming.factory package.

Thanks for your contribution. As you probably guessed from the rather long time it has taken for somebody to comment, this isn't a feature that is in demand from the Tomcat user base. Therefore, I am afriad that it will not be added to the Tomcat codebase. As such, I am going to close this issue as WONTFIX.

The issue will remain in the issue tracker and should the situation change, any user is free to re-open the issue and make the case for adding this feature.
creator: markt@apache.org
